module.name: REST Phone Applications
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php. Applications using the RESTful API
module.changelog: 2.11.2.40 Automatically go into edit mode when possible, on pages with 1 entry 2.11.2.39 Better handling of BLF in Parking application 2.11.2.38 Fix Parking app on Asterisk 13. 2.11.2.37 Set callforward extensions to be numeric 2.11.2.36 Add greetings and callback support to Voicemail application 2.11.2.33 Use more reliable method of restarting daemon on install. 2.11.2.32 Fix icons on Aastra 6867i/6869i. 2.11.2.30 Fix model number for Yealink T41P 2.11.2.29 Add BLF for Conference application 2.11.2.28 Sales cleanup 2.11.2.26 Add per-application option for hiding idle screen display (Aastra/Yealink only) 2.11.2.25 Split Transfer VM out to a separate sub-application 2.11.2.24 Allow transfering to a users voicemail while in call 2.11.2.22 Add support for Voicemail App 2.11.2.21 Make Login App work on Digium phones (firmware 1.4.2.0+) 2.11.2.20 Allow login/pause in Queues without dialing an extension 2.11.2.18 Add support for Queues and Queue Agents Apps 2.11.2.16 Upgrade to mysqli database connector 2.11.2.15 Add support for Time Conditions App 2.11.2.13 Add support for Call Flow App 2.11.2.12 Allow parking of the active call on Digium phones (firmware 1.4+) 2.11.2.11 Add support for Call Forward App 2.11.2.9 Start/stop restapps daemon on amportal start/stop. 2.11.2.5 Add Presence State preferences 2.11.2.4 Add support for Presence State App 2.11.2.3 Fix issue with login/logout for global settings 2.11.2.1 Add support for Login/Logout App 2.11.1.3 Have Conf Room app laucnh when using dial button 2.11.1.1 Add support for Conference Room App 2.11.0.11 Fix issue with directory 2.11.0.10 Fix bug with startup sync.php. 2.11.0.9 Add in new landing page 2.11.0.6 Add depends on End Point Manager 2.11.0.5 Add default landing page 2.11.0.3 first version
